categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Screamin' For More was a feature article in Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 6 by Nick Portantiere. It showcased Star Wars vinyl figures from Screamin' Products. It was based around an interview with company founders Dan Fay and Richard Hamecher discussing their company's start, plus the cycle of a figure from concept to shelf. It mentioned one of their sculptors, Joe Laudati, quality reviewer Jeff Brower, and the licensing approval route through Lucasfilm and the company's work with Julia Russo and Stacy Mollema.
